fragment.template: \t// Pin Filter 3 register (Attached to pin $(llwu_filt3_filtsel)) \tstatic constexpr uint8_t filt3 = \t $(llwu_filt3_filte) | \t LLWU_FILT_FILTSEL($(llwu_filt3_filtsel));\n\n
